short_summary: Service contract for the National Cybercrime (NC3) project
description: The contracting government agency is seeking proposals from professional service providers to design, document, and implement architecture solutions for the National Cybercrime (NC3) project. The project objective is to support technical solution development of the NC3 project through professional services of Application/Software Architect and Programmer/Analyst resources. Security clearance obtained is at the Designated Organization Screening (DOS) level.},
full_summary:
=================
### Professional Services for the National Cybercrime (NC3) Project

#### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number:** cb-548-17714423
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 202401961
* **Publication Date:** October 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Contracting Entity

* **Name:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* **Address:** 73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0R2

#### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Information Management/Information Technology (IM/IT) Program requires professional services for the National Cybercrime (NC3) project. This requirement is open to invited TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

**Scope of Work**

The RCMP is seeking services from Application/Software Architect and Programmer/Analyst resources to support the technical solution of the NC3 project. The scope of work includes:

* Developing, documenting, and/or revising Architecture solutions for the NC3 Project Architecture
* Infrastructure and components
* System Backup and Recovery
* Detailed Designs
* Impact Analysis
* Disaster Recovery
* Risk/Change Management

**Security Requirements**

* Security clearance level: SRCL 202401961 applies
* Minimum corporate security required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* Minimum resource security required: Enhanced Reliability

**Contact Information**

* **Name:** Stacy Semé
* **Email:** stacy.seme@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (000) 000-0000

#### Additional Information

* This RFP is issued under the TBIPS method of supply, which refreshes three times per year.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Bidders are advised to regularly consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date information. Canada will not be liable for any oversight on the Bidder's part.
